{{notFoundMessage}} {{resetLinkText}}
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-not-found', templateUrl: './not-found.component.html', styleUrls: ['./not-found.component.css'] }) export class NotFoundComponent implements OnInit { @Input() visible = false; @Input() notFoundMessage = "Nothing Found!"; @Input() resetLinkText = "Reset"; @Input() resetLinkRoute = "/"; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
